title: Replays On Mac
body:
Hi

I want to get better at league, and a lot of people recommend watching replays of your games and trying to figure out how you can improve.
Unfortunately, I play on a mac, so all the common replay programs don't work for me.

I was wondering if there was any reliable lol replay program that works on mac?

Thx

replies.body:
https://youtu.be/tNeuN4551qc

How to watch replays on mac using the file from op.gg
